CustomField.description: Used in the Flow that finds a new Save Opportunity to create a Target for. MS 7/6/15
CustomField.formula: Or( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "New"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Actively Working"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Assigned"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contact Attempted"))
CustomField.label: Target Flow Creation
